go_data.justification: Fyb/SLAP localizes at the interface between T cells and anti-CD3-coated beads, where it colocalizes with F-actin, and is involved in actin remodeling upon T cell stimulation.
Fyb/SLAP localizes exclusively to lamellipodia of spreading platelets.
Fyb/SLAP is a component of the TCR signaling complex and is involved in linking TCR signaling to actin remodeling.
Fyb/SLAP is present in a protein complex with WASP, SLP-76, and Nck in activated T cells.
